name: sbiev
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
-| wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution. Version of ~ sbie with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Jan-2023.) Remove dependence on ~ ax-10 and shorten proof. (Revised by BJ, 18-Jul-2023.)
